name: Cook for your soul
description:
Cook for your soul is a competitive local multiplayer cooking game. Face off against your friends and see who is the better cook! Who ever can feed the monster 25 points worth of food first saves their soul.

How to play

At the top of each players side are three recipes, they must make those recipes and put them on the conveyor belt to feed them to the monster for points. If you place the wrong food, or a food item you have already picked up you will lose points. If you are unsure of what an ingredient is, press 1 or ? to pull up the recipe menu.

To combine ingredients stack them on a plate and then use Q or Shift to combine ingredients together.

Controls Player 1

WASD to move

E short press to pick up and put down items

Q long hold to chop food and combine ingredients

1 to pull up recipe menu

Player 2

Recommend use of controller for player 2

Arrow keys to move

Space short press to pick up and put down items

Right Shift long hold to chop food and combine ingredients

? to pull up recipe menu

Controller

Plugging in one controller will control player2, while keyboard will control player 1

Plugging in a second controller will allow control of both players via controllers

*Switch pro controllers may have issues
